channel.title: CVE Feed for CODESYS -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for CODESYS -- all products

item.title: CVE-2022-32139|2024-09-16T16:13:22.976Z -- codesys -- runtime%20toolkit
item.description: In multiple CODESYS products, a low privileged remote attacker may craft a request, which cause an out-of-bounds read, resulting in a denial-of-service condition. User Interaction is not required.

item.title: CVE-2022-32143|2024-09-16T17:28:17.867Z -- codesys -- runtime%20toolkit
item.description: In multiple CODESYS products, file download and upload function allows access to internal files in the working directory e.g. firmware files of the PLC. All requests are processed on the controller only if no level 1 password is configured on the controller or if remote attacker has previously successfully authenticated himself to the controller. A successful Attack may lead to a denial of service, change of local files, or drain of confidential Information. User interaction is not required

item.title: CVE-2022-31805|2024-09-16T18:55:26.939Z -- codesys -- codesys%20development%20system
item.description: In the CODESYS Development System multiple components in multiple versions transmit the passwords for the communication between clients and servers unprotected.

item.title: CVE-2022-30791|2024-09-16T16:48:31.565Z -- codesys -- codesys%20control%20rte%20%28sl%29
item.description: In CmpBlkDrvTcp of CODESYS V3 in multiple versions an uncontrolled ressource consumption allows an unauthorized attacker to block new TCP connections. Existing connections are not affected.

item.title: CVE-2022-32136|2024-09-16T17:58:43.646Z -- codesys -- runtime%20toolkit
item.description: In multiple CODESYS products, a low privileged remote attacker may craft a request that cause a read access to an uninitialized pointer, resulting in a denial-of-service. User interaction is not required.

item.title: CVE-2022-1989|2024-09-16T18:29:51.457Z -- codesys -- codesys%20visualization
item.description: All CODESYS Visualization versions before V4.2.0.0 generate a login dialog vulnerable to information exposure allowing a remote, unauthenticated attacker to enumerate valid users.

item.title: CVE-2022-1965|2024-09-16T17:53:43.937Z -- codesys -- runtime%20toolkit
item.description: Multiple products of CODESYS implement a improper error handling. A low privilege remote attacker may craft a request, which is not properly processed by the error handling. In consequence, the file referenced by the request could be deleted. User interaction is not required.

item.title: CVE-2022-22515|2024-09-16T17:59:22.215Z -- codesys -- codesys%20control%20rte%20%28sl%29
item.description: A remote, authenticated attacker could utilize the control program of the CODESYS Control runtime system to use the vulnerability in order to read and modify the configuration file(s) of the affected products.

item.title: CVE-2022-32141|2024-09-16T17:27:44.290Z -- codesys -- runtime%20toolkit
item.description: Multiple CODESYS Products are prone to a buffer over read. A low privileged remote attacker may craft a request with an invalid offset, which can cause an internal buffer over-read, resulting in a denial-of-service condition. User interaction is not required.

item.title: CVE-2024-6876|2024-09-10T16:16:48.085Z -- codesys -- oscat%20basic%20library
item.description: Out-of-Bounds read vulnerability in OSCAT Basic Library allows an local, unprivileged attacker to access limited internal data of the PLC which may lead to a crash of the affected service.

item.title: CVE-2023-49676|2024-08-02T22:01:25.611Z -- codesys -- codesys%20development%20system%20v2.3
item.description: An unauthenticated local attacker may trick a user to open corrupted project files to crash the system due to use after free vulnerability.

item.title: CVE-2023-49675|2024-08-02T22:01:25.850Z -- codesys -- codesys%20development%20system%20v2.3
item.description: An unauthenticated local attacker may trick a user to open corrupted project files to execute arbitrary code or crash the system due to an out-of-bounds write vulnerability.

item.title: CVE-2024-5000|2024-08-01T20:55:10.389Z -- codesys -- codesys%20control%20for%20beaglebone%20sl
item.description: An unauthenticated remote attacker can use a malicious OPC UA client to send a crafted request to affected CODESYS products which can cause a DoS due to incorrect calculation of buffer size.

item.title: CVE-2023-5751|2024-06-04T17:28:31.539Z -- codesys -- codesys%20control%20win%20%28sl%29
item.description: A local attacker with low privileges can read and modify any users files and cause a DoS in the working directory of the affected products due to exposure of resource to wrong sphere.

item.title: CVE-2023-49675|2024-06-04T17:27:55.639Z -- codesys -- codesys%20development%20system%20v2.3
item.description: An unauthenticated local attacker may trick a user to open corrupted project files to execute arbitrary code or crash the system due to an out-of-bounds write vulnerability.

item.title: CVE-2023-49676|2024-05-06T11:09:34.442Z -- codesys -- codesys%20development%20system%20v2.3
item.description: An unauthenticated local attacker may trick a user to open corrupted project files to crash the system due to use after free vulnerability.

item.title: CVE-2024-5000|2024-06-06T14:44:44.216Z -- codesys -- codesys%20control%20for%20beaglebone%20sl
item.description: An unauthenticated remote attacker can use a malicious OPC UA client to send a crafted request to affected CODESYS products which can cause a DoS due to incorrect calculation of buffer size.

item.title: CVE-2023-49676|2024-06-12T20:23:58.235Z -- codesys -- codesys%20development%20system%20v2.3
item.description: An unauthenticated local attacker may trick a user to open corrupted project files to crash the system due to use after free vulnerability.

item.title: CVE-2023-5751|2024-08-02T08:07:32.848Z -- codesys -- codesys%20control%20win%20%28sl%29
item.description: A local attacker with low privileges can read and modify any users files and cause a DoS in the working directory of the affected products due to exposure of resource to wrong sphere.

item.title: CVE-2024-6876|2024-09-10T15:08:16.212Z -- codesys -- oscat%20basic%20library
item.description: Out-of-Bounds read vulnerability in OSCAT Basic Library allows an local, unprivileged attacker to access limited internal data of the PLC which may lead to a crash of the affected service.

item.title: CVE-2024-6876|2024-09-12T06:02:04.354Z -- codesys -- oscat%20basic%20library
item.description: Out-of-Bounds read vulnerability in OSCAT Basic Library allows an local, unprivileged attacker to access limited internal data of the PLC which may lead to a crash of the affected service.
